QuestData.Title: The Elementium Axe
QuestData.Description: The Twilight cowards have captured and killed many red dragons, but one's still breathing. Do you remember Lirastrasza? She's chained nearby and we're going to free her.$B$BBut first, we need something sharp enough to cut her free.$B$BThere's an old ettin named Blindeye the Guardian. He stands watch at the Altar of Ascension to the south.$B$BHe has a purely-wrought Elementium axe. I wonder if that's Cho'gall's "ultimate" weapon?
QuestData.RewardText: That's a very sharp axe. It'll do the job, but if I'm any judge of weaponry, that's not what Cho'gall's after.
